Witch Bolt (W1 Evoc): R30' Ranged spell inflicts 1d12 HP lightning/rd for conc or 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d12 HP initial]
Magic Notes:
Arcane Recovery: Taking a short rest restores 5 spell slot levels 1/dy
Illusion Savant: May copy illusion spells into spellbook for half cost
Illusory Self: May use Reaction to cause a foe miss 1/short rest
Improved Minor Illusion: Knows Minor Illusion cantrip; effect includes both sound and image
Malleable Illusions: May modify cast illusions throughout duration
Ritual Casting: May cast a known spell using a ritual
Notes
Validation Errors:
Fighter-Feinting Attack Selectable Feature: Requires fighter level >= 3
Fighter-Lunging Attack Selectable Feature: Requires fighter level >= 3
